title: 3 Killed, UN Peacekeepers Injured In Latest Israeli Airstrikes On Lebanon
content: The Lebanese army said an Israeli strike on a vehicle near a checkpoint in the southern city of Sidon on Thursday killed three people and wounded troops and UN peacekeepers.
summary: The Lebanese army said an Israeli strike on a vehicle near a checkpoint in the southern city of Sidon on Thursday killed three people and wounded troops and UN peacekeepers.

title: "Go Work For...": Amazon CEO To Employees Protesting End Of WFH
content: 523 Amazon employees protested the "return to office" policy and urged management to maintain remote work flexibility.
summary: 523 Amazon employees protested the "return to office" policy and urged management to maintain remote work flexibility.

title: France Sees 'Window' To End Wars In Gaza, Lebanon After Trump's Victory
content: French Foreign Minister Jean-Noel Barrot said Thursday in Jerusalem he saw prospects for ending Israel's wars in Gaza and Lebanon after Donald Trump was elected US president.
summary: French Foreign Minister Jean-Noel Barrot said Thursday in Jerusalem he saw prospects for ending Israel's wars in Gaza and Lebanon after Donald Trump was elected US president.

title: "World Must Prepare For Climate Calamity": UN Chief
content: The world is nowhere near ready for the "calamity" being caused by climate change and must urgently prepare for even worse in the future, UN Secretary General Antonio Guterres said Thursday.
summary: The world is nowhere near ready for the "calamity" being caused by climate change and must urgently prepare for even worse in the future, UN Secretary General Antonio Guterres said Thursday.

title: "China Is Common Adversary In Space-Military Race", Warns Top US General
content: The United States wants to broaden cooperation and collaboration with India in space technology - particularly as it relates to militarisation of the 'final frontier' to deny common adversaries like China - a top US Space Command official told NDTV.
summary: The United States wants to broaden cooperation and collaboration with India in space technology - particularly as it relates to militarisation of the 'final frontier' to deny common adversaries like China - a top US Space Command official told NDTV.

title: "In Good Health": NASA Amid Reports Of Sunita William's Declining Health
content: Amid growing concerns over Sunita Williams' health, NASA recently clarified that all the astronauts aboard the International Space Station (ISS) are in "good health".
summary: Amid growing concerns over Sunita Williams' health, NASA recently clarified that all the astronauts aboard the International Space Station (ISS) are in "good health".

title: US Reinstates Plea Deal For 9/11 Mastermind, Other Suspects
content: A US military judge has reinstated plea agreements for 9/11 mastermind Khalid Sheikh Mohammed and two other defendants, three months after the deals were scrapped by Defense Secretary Lloyd Austin.
summary: A US military judge has reinstated plea agreements for 9/11 mastermind Khalid Sheikh Mohammed and two other defendants, three months after the deals were scrapped by Defense Secretary Lloyd Austin.

title: Girl, 3, Goes To Court In Lahore As Air Quality Continues To Be Hazardous
content: A three-year-old girl has filed a petition against the local government in Pakistan's Punjab as the province, especially its capital Lahore, continues to reel under the severe impact of smog, keeping the air quality in an extremely hazardous zone.
summary: A three-year-old girl has filed a petition against the local government in Pakistan's Punjab as the province, especially its capital Lahore, continues to reel under the severe impact of smog, keeping the air quality in an extremely hazardous zone.

title: China Woman Sparks Outrage With Video Of Son Urinating On Family Meal
content: In China, a mothers social media post ignited a fierce debate when she shared an unusual family incident: her young son urinated on a dining table, and the family continued to eat the meal.
summary: In China, a mothers social media post ignited a fierce debate when she shared an unusual family incident: her young son urinated on a dining table, and the family continued to eat the meal.

title: How Donald Trump's Win Will Affect Globalisation? S Jaishankar Explains
content: In a press briefing after his meeting with top business leaders and CEOs in Australia, S Jaishankar mentioned about "something that happened yesterday", referring to the US election result. Mr Jaishankar said India "perceives this as an opportunity".
summary: In a press briefing after his meeting with top business leaders and CEOs in Australia, S Jaishankar mentioned about "something that happened yesterday", referring to the US election result. Mr Jaishankar said India "perceives this as an opportunity".

title: North Korean Soldiers Get Internet Access In Ukraine, Hooked On Porn: Report
content: North Korean soldiers, who joined the war front in Ukraine on behalf of Russia recently, received access to unrestricted internet - a wildly exciting concept for them.
summary: North Korean soldiers, who joined the war front in Ukraine on behalf of Russia recently, received access to unrestricted internet - a wildly exciting concept for them.

title: Opinion: Musk Is The Risk
content: Musk, however, is also a risk to Trump as his business interests may clash with US foreign policy. For instance, Teslas largest factory is in Shanghai, and another one is in Berlin. Both countries are bracing for higher tariff barriers under Trump.
summary: Musk, however, is also a risk to Trump as his business interests may clash with US foreign policy. For instance, Teslas largest factory is in Shanghai, and another one is in Berlin. Both countries are bracing for higher tariff barriers under Trump.

title: 'Fictosexual' Japan Man Celebrates 6 Years Of Marriage With Virtual Wife
content: Akihiko Kondo, a Japanese man who married the fictional vocaloid character Hatsune Miku in 2018, recently celebrated his sixth anniversary with her.
summary: Akihiko Kondo, a Japanese man who married the fictional vocaloid character Hatsune Miku in 2018, recently celebrated his sixth anniversary with her.

title: India Calls Out Canada's Move Against Outlet That Interviewed S Jaishankar
content: Responding strongly to reports of social media handles and pages of an Australian news outlet being blocked in Canada, India has said such actions highlight the hypocrisy of Canada towards freedom of speech.
summary: Responding strongly to reports of social media handles and pages of an Australian news outlet being blocked in Canada, India has said such actions highlight the hypocrisy of Canada towards freedom of speech.

title: Indian-Origin Man Sells Chat.com URL To ChatGPT For Over $15 Million
content: This domain was previously owned by Dharmesh Shah, HubSpot's founder and CTO.

title: India Cancels Consular Camp In Toronto Over 'Inadequate Security'
content: Days after the attack on a Hindu temple in Canada's Brampton, the Minister of External Affairs announced the cancellation of consular camps in Toronto over security issues.
summary: Days after the attack on a Hindu temple in Canada's Brampton, the Minister of External Affairs announced the cancellation of consular camps in Toronto over security issues.

title: Hope For Cancer Patients, New Treatment Strategy Targets Rogue DNA
content: The research, which analyzed data from over 15,000 UK cancer patients, identifies ecDNA as a key factor in cancer progression and drug resistance.
summary: The research, which analyzed data from over 15,000 UK cancer patients, identifies ecDNA as a key factor in cancer progression and drug resistance.

title: US Man Dropped Fiance's Baby On His Head, Squeezed Him To Stop Crying
content: The child was taken to a nearby hospital and then transferred to a children's hospital in Kansas City, Missouri, about two hours away.
summary: The child was taken to a nearby hospital and then transferred to a children's hospital in Kansas City, Missouri, about two hours away.

title: "Threat To US Security": NATO's Big Warning On North Korea-Russia Ties
content: The strengthening ties between Russia and North Korea are not only a threat to European security, but also to the United States, NATO Secretary-General Mark Rutte said.
summary: The strengthening ties between Russia and North Korea are not only a threat to European security, but also to the United States, NATO Secretary-General Mark Rutte said.

title: Malaysia Announces Restart Of MH370 Search Based On "Credible" Proposal
content: Interestingly, the search will follow a "no find, no fee" structure, ensuring that Malaysia only incurs costs if the wreckage is located.
summary: Interestingly, the search will follow a "no find, no fee" structure, ensuring that Malaysia only incurs costs if the wreckage is located.
